Name: Finn Rouge
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) 2 sugar to 1 water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A rather red, rasping, berry rich drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Jamie Stephenson, Manchester, England.
